description: It's a trail up Bunzen Peak, only minutes away from Mammoth Hot Springs in Yellowstone National Park.  The peak offers a great view of the area surrounding Mammoth Hot Springs, as well as Gardner River and Sheepeater Canyon.  The trail offers an out and back or a loop option.
directions: From Mammoth Hot Spring, go south on highway 89 for approximately 6.9km and you will come up to the parking lot, located on your left.
title: Bunzen Peak (Wyoming)
